mapper.insert: insert into t_access_application_invoice_title ( invoice_title_name, default_id, invoice_title_sts, app_invoice_title_id, record_id ) values ( #{invoice_title_name}, #{default_id}, #{invoice_title_sts}, #{app_invoice_title_id}, #{record_id} )
mapper.update: update t_access_application_invoice_title set invoice_title_id = #{invoice_title_id}, invoice_title_name = #{invoice_title_name}, default_id = #{default_id}, invoice_title_sts = #{invoice_title_sts}, app_invoice_title_id = #{app_invoice_title_id}, record_id = #{record_id} where invoice_title_id = #{invoice_title_id}
